text.label: Saab JA-37 Viggen Route Manager System
Take-off base is shared for all Mission routes.
Interaction with the routes and areas is done on the TI color display.
Only Flightgear fgfp xml or GPX files is supported for loading.
Notice that all this can be loaded at startup. See manual for that.
The Mission and RTB routes must max have 48 waypoints in each.
The LV areas must max have 8 waypoints in each.
